title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 256.1 - Examination and condemnation of unwholesome food and damaged utensils
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 256.1 - Examination and condemnation of unwholesome food and damaged utensils

State Regulations

Samples of food, drink and single service food containers
and utensils, soda straws, paper napkins or any product of a similar nature may
be taken by the commissioner as often as may be necessary for the detection of
unwholesomeness, damage or contamination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
256.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
